name: UFGRecipe
comment: This is a class describing a recipe, subclass this in blueprint to make a new recipe.

methods.name: GetRecipeName
methods.comment: Get the display name for this recipe.

methods.name: GetIngredients
methods.comment: Get the ingredients for this recipe.

methods.name: GetProducts
methods.comment: Get the products for this recipe. @todo remove unused allowChildRecipes.

methods.name: GetManufacturingDuration
methods.comment: Get the base manufacturing duration for this recipe.

methods.name: GetProducedIn
methods.comment: Get which buildings/or build gun this recipe can be used in.

methods.name: IsRecipeAffordable
methods.comment: Can the given player afford the recipe.

methods.name: SortByName
methods.comment: Sort an array dependent on their name.

methods.name: SetProduct
methods.comment: Sets the products produced from this recipe. Only for editor use

properties.name: mDisplayNameOverride
properties.comment: If we override the display name or get it from the first products item name.

properties.name: mDisplayName
properties.comment: Overridden name for this recipe, if mDisplayNameOverride is false the first product's item name is used.

properties.name: mIngredients
properties.comment: Ingredients needed to produce the products.

properties.name: mProduct
properties.comment: The products produced from this recipe.

properties.name: mManufactoringDuration
properties.comment: The time it takes to produce the output.

properties.name: mManualManufacturingMultiplier
properties.comment: The time it takes to produce the output.

properties.name: mProducedIn
properties.comment: Defines where this recipe can be produced
